trans-unit.source: Provides information about a type that components can access across application domain and process boundaries.
The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> structure provides information about an object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.

To get type information about a remote object, components call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to obtain an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>.
Then, components call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetTypeData%2A> method to get a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData>.
Indicates the rank (that is, the number of dimensions) of the remote array type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes.
To determine whether a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes an array, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData.IsArray> field.
Represents the full name of the assembly that contains the remote type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes.
Represents the name of the remote type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes, qualified by the name of the assembly that contains the type.
The assembly-qualified name of a type includes the name of the assembly from which the type was loaded.
For more information about the format of an assembly-qualified name, see the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
Represents the attributes of the remote type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes.
The value of this field is <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Public> if this <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes the type of a COM object.
Represents the base type of the remote type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes.
Represents the type of the elements in the remote array type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes.
To determine whether a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes an array, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData.IsArray> field.
Represents the name of the remote type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes, qualified by the namespace.
The fully qualified name of a type includes the namespace of the type, but not the assembly from which the type was loaded.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes an array type.
The value of this field is `true` if the current <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes an array type; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes a type that is passed by reference.
The value of this field is `true` if the current <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData> describes a type that is passed by reference; otherwise, the value of this field is `false`.
Represents member data for the remote type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes.
Represents the type of the remote type that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> describes.
If the remote type is an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>, the value of this field is <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
